title: 이달의소녀탐구 #448 (LOONA TV #448)
summary:
0:01 -- HaSeul shows a text exchange between OEC and ViVi. HeeJin adjusts ViVi's frills and asks her to raise her shoulders.
0:21 -- HyunJin is shaking her hands behind ViVi to which HaSeul says that she's an angel and not a pigeon.
0:23 -- ViVi: "If I am a pigeon..." and then proceeds to attack HaSeul.
0:28 -- HeeJin is peeking through the curtains and accidently makes eye contact with a fan entering the concert.
0:34 -- ⅓ makes weird faces. "Jeon, Kim, Jo, Hwang fighting~" and the ⅓ Hertz begins.
